description:
Agenda:

6.00 pm  Arrival and drinks

6.30 pm  Presentations (followed by networking and drinks)

• Speaker #1: Data Science meets Julia (features peculiar to Julia and poses the question whether it is also destined to become a natural fit to to data science in the future) - Malcolm Sherrington, AMIS Consulting LLP

• Speaker #2: Set your text free with Loquor (emotional analysis using the emolex lexicon, Gensim's implementation of Word2Vec, and FaceBook's fastText) - Nigel Legg, MassCognition

• Speaker #3: Tracking Your FitBit Data with R and Shiny - Graham Parsons, Mango Solutions

Use the hashtag if you're tweeting: #BristolDS
title: Bristol Data Scientists Meeting
